select.info: Define a variable that stores the selection of this chart.

multiSelect.info: Whether to allow multiple entities to be selected.

showHeader.info: Whether to show the table header.

showSearchBar.info: Whether to show a search interface.

color.info: Which property to use for the color

groupby.info: By which property to group aggregations.

waitingForInputMessage.info: Text to display while waiting for input.

waitingForDataMessage.info: Text to display while waiting for data.
